snippet: Officials insisted that the Patriot missile batteries, drawn from Dutch, German and American forces, would be used only to defend Turkey, not to intervene in Syria.
abstract: NATO foreign ministers endorse decision to send Patriot missile batteries to Turkey; Turkey requested missiles in November, fearing that it may be vulnerable to Syrian missile attack; NATO insists that missiles, drawn from Dutch, German and American forces, would be used only to defend Turkey, not to intervene in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Officials insisted that the Patriot missile batteries, drawn from Dutch, German and American forces, would be used only to defend Turkey, not to intervene in Syria.

headline.seo: NATO Backs Defensive Missiles for Turkey
headline.main: NATO Backs Defense Plan for Turkey
headline.print_headline: NATO Backs Defense Plan for Turkey

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
